Headline: #22 Clark, #151 Sheridan Temporary Northbound Reroute near Bryn Mawr/Winthrop
ShortDescription: NB 22 Clark, 151 Sheridan  buses are temporarily rerouted via: Lake Shore Drive, Hollywood, Ridge and Clark due to, street blockage near Bryn Mawr/Winthrop.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #22 Clark, #151 Sheridan  buses are temporarily rerouted via: Lake Shore Drive, Hollywood, Ridge and Clark due to, street blockage near Bryn Mawr/Winthrop.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near Bryn Mawr/Winthrop
ShortDescription: NB 147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express buses are temp. rerouted via: Lake Shore Drive, Hollywood and Broadway due to, street blockage near Bryn Mawr/Winthrop.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted via: Lake Shore Drive, Hollywood and Broadway due to, street blockage near Bryn Mawr/Winthrop.

Headline: #155 Devon Temporary Reroute near Morse/Greenview.
ShortDescription:
155 Devon buses rerouted Westbound buses will operate via Morse, Clark, Pratt, & Sheridan.
Eastbound buses will operate via Pratt, Ashland, & Morse.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#155 Devon buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to police activity near Morse/Greenview.

Westbound buses will operate via Morse, Clark, Pratt, and Sheridan.
Eastbound buses will operate via Pratt, Ashland, and Morse.
Allow extra travel time.
